name: The Question Machine
description:
Hey gamers, do you like choose your own adventure games? Ever wonder what life would be like if you had done things a little differently? Well with the raaaaadical Question Machine, you can find out dude! Can you hear it? The mechanical screaming?   For the low price of FREE, the Question Machine is gonna totally blow your mind dude! It RAAWKS!

(I know its large for a text-based game, but its got full narration! Don't mind the .quest extension, instructions are provided on download.)
